title: Serial Dilution for CFU Quantification
author: Opentrons
description: With this protocol, your robot can perform serial dilution by transferring PBS from a 12-column trough into a 96-well plate and dilute the solutions down the columns in the plate.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Multichannel pipette will distribute 180 uL PBS from reagent trough to row B to H of the 96-well plate.
Single-channel pipette will serial dilute row A down the column by transferring 20 uL. Tip will be changed between each column.
notes: Make sure to remove the A1 tip from the tiprack in slot 5. This way the pipette will not distribute PBS to row A in the plate.

markdown.title: Serial Dilution for CFU Quantification
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: With this protocol, your robot can perform serial dilution by transferring PBS from a 12-column trough into a 96-well plate and dilute the solutions down the columns in the plate.
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
6. Multichannel pipette will distribute 180 uL PBS from reagent trough to row B to H of the 96-well plate.
7. Single-channel pipette will serial dilute row A down the column by transferring 20 uL. Tip will be changed between each column.
markdown.notes: * Make sure to remove the A1 tip from the tiprack in **slot 5**. This way the pipette will not distribute PBS to row A in the plate.
